text:
Ambrose of Dorostol (born Alexander Alexandrov Parashkevov; 9 June 1942 – 18 August 2020) was a Bulgarian Orthodox clergyman. He was the Bishop of Branitsa from 1998 to 2010 and Metropolitan of Dorostol from 2010 to his death in 2020. He was a member of the Bulgarian Orthodox Church.
Dorostolski died from COVID-19 on 18 August 2020 in Silistra at the age of 78.
